description: FiHub MOD (Move Dollar) track configuration. MOD is Thala's collateralized stablecoin on Aptos. This file documents how MOD is wired for construction, resolvers, and testing. NOTE: The MOD Interaction List (MOD.json) has been removed from the website; only APT, USDC, USDT tracks are shown. This config is kept for reference if MOD is re-added later.

thalaAptModPair.runtimeDeps: Thala pool resolver for LP step

construction.swap: Same as APT/USDC: type_arguments_source runtime, resolve Thala pool via resolveThalaV1Pool(MOD, other). getAptosTokenType('MOD') in lib/aptosTokenTypes.ts.
construction.lp: Same as Thala APT/USDC: context.selectedPairTokens or fromToken/toToken; Thala pool resolver.
construction.mint: mod_stablecoin::mint — type_arguments from IL; no resolver.
construction.redeem: mod_stablecoin::redeem — type_arguments from IL; no resolver.
construction.borrow: vault_scripts::borrow — type_arguments from IL; no resolver.
construction.repay: vault_scripts::repay — type_arguments from IL; no resolver.

tokenTypeConfig: MOD is registered in lib/aptosTokenTypes.ts SYMBOL_TO_TYPE so swap/LP pool resolution works for pairs like MOD/APT, MOD/USDC.
canonicalToThala: MOD (mod_stablecoin::MOD) is identical in Thala registry; no entry needed in canonical-to-thala-asset-types.json (see notes there).
forkliftVerification: Optional: add MOD Thala swap or mint to __tests__/forklift/track-verification.test.ts (featured-tracks step) to include MOD in balance report. Requires Thala pool for MOD pair in thala-pools.json.
